arts.ttl: Wolves boss Gary O'Neil praises Goncalo Guedes despite EFL Cup exit to Brighton & Hove Albion
arts.sum: Wolverhampton Wanderers head coach Gary O'Neil heaps praise on Goncalo Guedes despite the winger featuring in the club's 3-2 defeat at Brighton & Hove Albion in the EFL Cup.

arts.ttl: Gary O’Neil rues same problems as Wolves exit Carabao Cup at Brighton
arts.sum: Wolves have taken only a single point from their opening four Premier League fixtures.

arts.ttl: Fabian Hurzeler's unbeaten start continues as Brighton accept early Wolves gifts
arts.sum: BRIGHTON 3-2 WOLVES; Fabian Hurzeler's Albion are into the last 16 of the EFL Cup but they flirted with danger after almost throwing away a comfortable two-goal lead

arts.ttl: Spectacular Carlos Baleba effort helps Brighton past Wolves in Carabao Cup
arts.sum: Brighton made eight changes following Saturday’s frustrating goalless draw with Ipswich.

arts.ttl: Brighton beat Wolves to reach Carabao Cup fourth round
arts.sum: Brighton edged past Wolves with a 3-2 victory to seal their spot in round four of the Carabao Cup.

arts.ttl: Brighton player ratings vs Wolves: Three 8s as 'classy' midfielder scores a screamer; winger stars again and new signings grabs crucial goal
arts.sum: Brighton and Hove Albion secured a hard-fought 3-2 victory over Wolverhampton Wanderers in the Carabao Cup – as they took revenge for last season’s FA Cup exit.

arts.ttl: Spectacular Carlos Baleba effort helps Brighton past Wolves in Carabao Cup
arts.sum: Brighton made eight changes following Saturday’s frustrating goalless draw with Ipswich.

However, despite that positive period of play, Wolves fell further behind on 32 when Adingra came inside, beyond Lima and Santiago Bueno, before curling low into the bottom corner, beyond Sa. Like on Sunday, there were positives on show in the Old Gold’s performance, but they made life tough from the moment Carlos Baleba and Simon Adingra curled home low from outside of the box in the opening 31 minutes.

arts.ttl: Carlos Baleba's brilliant goal and wild celebration against Wolves
arts.sum: Brighton lead Wolves 2-1 at halftime in the Carabao Cup third round at the Amex Stadium

arts.ttl: Carabao Cup fourth round draw details confirmed: Brighton, Wolves, Tottenham and ball number latest
arts.sum: Carabao Cup fourth round draw details
